rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Lemour Inn!
Rest-place of all traders!

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0002
rows.name: I'd like to rest up a bit.

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Thank very much for custom!
We has rooms free!

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0103
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Resting at an inn is so different from
sleeping in that hut on Gramps' back...

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0104
rows.name: I even feel like I've got a little stronger.

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0105
rows.name:
Right, time to head to the
meeting point!

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0106
rows.name: It was at Goldmund Exit Dock, right?

rows.label: tlk42450113_02_msg0201
rows.name:
Actually, I think I'll wait a bit
longer before resting up.
